channel.title: Recipes on Arshad Siddiqui
channel.description: Recent content in Recipes on Arshad Siddiqui

item.title: Sids Chicken Curry
item.description: 99% of what I see is forgotten. 99% of what I think remains locked inside me. 99% of my words are lost within a short while of them being spoken. “Silence is Golden” but there may be a few of those words that are worth sharing. Recipes jotted down but incomplete; they could just be useful to someone. A thought - a trigger - a reminder. So I’m going to post them here.
